text:
@realDonaldTrump Guess what else is "most" in the world?  4.25% of the world's population is American, yet:
.
-30% of the world's COVID-19 infections are American (1,681,418 and counting)

-28% of the world's COVID-19 deaths are Americans (98,929 and counting) https://t.co/xqaBLJewV4

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
